entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Convert to generated regex fixer is disabled on regex parse errors hit during counting captures #80004
  • NativeAOT did not produce code for contstructor #80002
  • Document System.Net.Quic prerequisites and supported OSes #80001
  • [API Proposal]: Add Task.Run overload that avoids capturing the ExecutionContext #80000
  • [API Proposal]: ConfigurationBinder should have a Get method that returns non nullable T when record type is used #79999
    Future
  • mscordbi.dll 4.700.22.55902 is missing from symbol servers. #79996
    8.0.0
  • SemaphoreSlim constructor parameter doc #79995
  • [wasm][globalization][icu] Prepare basis for `HybridGlobalization` #79992
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][globalization][icu] Tracking issue for HybridGlobalization: Web API + ICU #79989
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] Allow basic ICU sharding in WASM app like Blazor does it + custom files #79987
    8.0.0
  • libraries-jitstress-random assert failed (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == nullptr) || (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == igLoopHeader) #79986
    8.0.0
  • vs2022 17.5.0 preview2.0 failed to load the old project #79984

Closed

  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan support is failing in some circumstances #79477
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557.cmd #79518
    8.0.0
  • [Jit][Intrinsics] Local variables mixed up #79399
  • Access Violation assigning ref readonly field #78268
  • TaskWebClientTest.UploadValues_Success test is failing #79731
    8.0.0
  • Crash in ThrowHelper.ThrowJsonReaderException #77898
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve some regex patterns in `MonoSDBHelper.cs` #78979
    8.0.0
  • Prepare `icudt_wasm.dat` and corresponding sharded datafiles without `collations/standard`, enable setting `HybridGlobalization` and write WBT checking if the new file got loaded instead of the old one #79991
  • [wasm][icu] Canonical locales are not in filters but users would like to use them #79816
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT drops unused volatile reads. #6280
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] CreateDump: Only add pages with committed memory #80005
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Remove framework libraries from ILC package #80003
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 #79997
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79994
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Sync ILLink to latest dotnet/linker commits #79918
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Handle `LCL_FLD_ADDR` in TreeLifeUpdater #79913
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add executable bit to tizen sh files #79998
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Modified regexes used for group-match. #79988
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79281
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix WebClient url encoding regression #79975
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0

Updated

  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix CPU_COUNT check for FreeBSD 13.1+ #77867
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix the ARM's `double` register name displayed in JitDisasm/JitDump #79949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Reuse handles inside a loop in reflection_create_dynamic_metho… #79716
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.3

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-27

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Adjust conditional params tests #29645
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Templates

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2074353 #29624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29629

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentException from RemoteDiagnosticAnalyzerService #66138
  • Bug: Using foreach, it's possible to accidentally mutate a ref readonly without any unsafe code #66135
  • Roslyn fails to detect nested nullability mismatch in implicit conversions to delegates #66134
  • Roslyn fails to infer correct nullability in lambda expressions with user defined conversions #66131
  • Roslyn fails to infer correct nullability for lambda expressions with tuples #66130

Closed

  • RemoteInvocationException when updating package #66133
  • `SyntaxTree.GetChanges()` returns non-deterministic results #65580
  • IntelliSense and analyzers node are *completely* broken with legacy style .csproj projects and manual Roslyn multi-targeting #66047
  • Source Generator : FileNotFoundException Could not load file or assembly #66124

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce amount of stack used by CodeGenerator.EmitInstanceCallExpression #66137
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66132
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Implement new lookup rules for Primary Constructor parameters #66054
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Cleanup dead MSBuild conditions #66052
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Managed way to handle js disposal in blazor-to-js interop #45786
  • Add keys to OIDC state and retrieve at callback #45785
  • obsolete EnableDataAnnotationsValidation, requires IServiceProvider now #45783
  • Perf regression: json #45781
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #45780
  • Why should a principal be recreated? #45776
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #45774

Closed

  • Blazor component removed from DOM before disposal causes js interop to fail #45777
  • Microsoft.aspnetcore.identity.ui v 7.01 will not run. #45773
  • EventCallback<Action<T>> Does not invoke delegate / How to convert Func<T> to EventCallback? #45754
  • Custom model binding in Blazor's SupplyParameterFromQueryAttribute #45747
  • Latest supported version on .NET Framework #45743
  • Arabic text get reversed in <pre> tag in MVC app #45757
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #45769
  • .Net 7 UserManager.FindByNameAsync returns null when using await #45759

PullRequests

Created

  • Updated the ownership of the Mvc area path #45784
    area-infrastructure
  • Added copy parameters to enable parallel build #45779
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Update Helix.Common.props #45772
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update Helix.Common.props #45771
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix ReasonPhrases doc reference #45778
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Adopt consistent approach for defining InternalsVisibleTo in the repo #45748
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui MacCatalyst app can't be successfully submitted to Apple macOS store #12311
  • Building a NuGet package from .NET MAUI Class Library with Source Link results in the error described. #12309
  • CustomShellRenderer to change the color of navbar to a linear gradient #12307
  • build fails if xaml is in Platform/Windows folder #12306
  • MVVM: DataTrigger.Value Does Not Respond to Data Binding #12305

Closed

  • NotifyCanExecuteChanged event doesn't set correct button color on Windows #12222
    Backlog
  • Unable to upgrade from Xamarin Forms using migration assistant #12308
  • .NET MAUI Blazor Not Showing Blazor Views on iOS Simulator #12304
  • Button IsEnabled property in Windows Platform #7377
    Backlog
  • .Net MAUI clicked Button stays gray after enabling #12073

PullRequests

Created

  • Update image source after recycling bitmap in custom target #12310

Merged

  • Update Essentials Permissions API Docs #12252
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials MediaPicker API Docs #12245
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials OrientationSensor API Docs #12247
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Update Essentials PhoneDialer API Docs #12253
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Simplify hardcoded array of C# keywords in CodeBehindGenerator #12195
    community ✨
  • Update Essentials Screenshot API Docs #12269
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Preferences API Docs #12265
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add basic Android automated accessibility testing #11097
    area/testing
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12157
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
